== Stats == Hatchery Helpers have 3 important stats: '''Cost, Step Efficiency and Attack Efficiency''' (see below). At this time, Hatchery Helpers Doens't Cost you when there is no eggs to hatch.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Stat !! Description !! Usage |- | '''Cost''' || Cost Per Hatch of the Hatcher Hellper || Cost is deducted from your every hatch that the Hatchery Helper made. |- | '''Step Efficiency''' || How much of the egg steps it will use || If the Hatchery helper has 50% step efficiency, they will use on the egg half of the egg steps you gain. |- | '''Attack Efficiency''' || How much of the attack you pokemon will gain || If the Hatchery helper has 50% attack efficiency, when the egg hatch it will gain half of the attack it should get. |- |}
== Usage ==
Clicking on "Sort" opens a dropdown that allows you to select which specific way the Hatchery Helpers works on, where the arrow is from the right it is following the highest to lowest of the option you selected if its the arrow is to the left it is going by lowest to highest.
